overview: AVN's Best New Series, Glamour Girls is back. Performer Of The Year, Tori Black stars in Glamour Girls 3, alongside Angelina Armani, Samantha Ryan, Catalina Taylor, and Eva Angelina, directed by the award winning, William H, and shot in 1080p HD. Featuring five intense and passionate hardcore sex scenes, the movie also includes extended tease sequences for each girl in an epic location.
title: Glamour Girls 3
